DOC.criteria: smoker ( > 10 cig/day ) past 1 year normosmic olfactory function previous/current use insulin current Diagnostic Statistical ManualIVRevised ( DSMIVR ) Axis I disorder current pregnancy ( lactation ) lifetime history endocrine disease excessive alcohol use ( > 25 standard unit alcohol/week ) current use illicit drug current use smoking cessation aid ( NRT , Chantix Wellbutrin ) , psychotropic agent local infection , inflammation , structural abnormality , nasal pathology current use medication administer intranasally , include intranasal steroid
